rows.hard_exit_criteria: Rust->Zig and Zig->Rust proof interoperability green for pinned commit; full module parity vectors and negative cases; no unresolved divergence records
rows.remaining_required_scope: Complete full prover pipeline (trace -> composition -> PCS/FRI -> proof), complete verifier parity for all paths, finalize proof wire compatibility, complete transcript and channel compatibility, complete hash/VCS parity for all production paths, complete PoW and config parity

rows.hard_exit_criteria: Differential tests against Rust constraint outputs for fixed seeds/traces; all edge/failure tests green
rows.remaining_required_scope: Complete quotient/evaluator edge semantics and broaden law/property coverage for all expression rewrites used by prover paths

rows.hard_exit_criteria: Rust parity vectors for AIR utilities and composition checkpoints; full integration tests with proof generation and verification
rows.remaining_required_scope: Expand remaining trace helper surface and integrate deeper AIR composition plumbing in non-example prover paths

rows.hard_exit_criteria: Compile-time generated outputs parity-tested against Rust expectations; no manual per-AIR boilerplate required beyond declared conformance limit
rows.remaining_required_scope: Extend derive-like helpers to remaining upstream patterns beyond component adapters and lookup row helpers
rows.zig_target_area: Zig compile-time generation layer (comptime helpers/macros equivalent)

rows.hard_exit_criteria: Every selected Rust example has Zig equivalent and bidirectional verification with semantic tamper rejection
rows.remaining_required_scope: Continue example expansion beyond `xor`, `state_machine`, `wide_fibonacci`, and `plonk`, while preserving deterministic bidirectional interop and tamper coverage

rows.hard_exit_criteria: Freestanding verifier build passes conformance test matrix; behavior matches standard build for identical inputs
rows.remaining_required_scope: Add behavior-parity coverage between standard verifier and freestanding profile across wider fixture matrix
rows.zig_target_area: freestanding/minimal Zig verifier profile and build flags
